Documentation.long_help: Read mesh in EGRID format and time dependent data from UNRST output files.
Documentation.short_help: Reader for EGRID and UNRST files.

StringVectorProperty.name: FilenameBase
StringVectorProperty.label: test string
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Common base name of both EGRID and UNRST files.

IntVectorProperty.name: vtkMultiBlockDataSet
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The value of this property determines the dataset type for the output of the programmable filter.

StringVectorProperty.name: Script
StringVectorProperty.default_values: assert test_bool == True assert test_int == 123 assert test_int_vector == [1, 2, 3] assert test_double == 1.23 assert test_double_vector == [1.1, 2.2, 3.3] assert test_string == "string value"
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property contains the text of a python program that the programmable source runs.
